Monster.Name: Werebear
Monster.ACText: in humanoid form, 11 (natural armor) in bear and hybrid form

Speeds.string: 30 ft. (40ft. in bear or hybrid form)
climb 30 ft. in bear or hybrid form

Immunities.string: bludgeoning from nonmagical attacks that aren’t silvered
piercing from nonmagical attacks that aren’t silvered
slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren’t silvered

MonsterTrait.Name: Shapechanger
MonsterTrait.Text: The werebear can use its action to polymorph into a Large bear-humanoid hybrid or into a Large bear, or back into its true form, which is humanoid. Its statistics, other than its size and AC, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn’t transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

MonsterTrait.Name: Keen Smell
MonsterTrait.Text: The werebear has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: In bear form, the werebear makes two claw attacks. In humanoid form, it makes two greataxe attacks. In hybrid form, it can attack like a bear or a humanoid.

MonsterAction.Name: Bite (Bear or Hybrid Form Only)
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) piercing damage. If the target is a humanoid, it must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be cursed with werebear lycanthropy.

MonsterAction.Name: Claw (Bear or Hybrid Form Only)
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Greataxe (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (1d12 + 4) slashing damage.
